trans-unit.source: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Whenever you discard a card, if it has madness, untap Anje Falkenrath.
trans-unit.target: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Whenever you discard a card, if it has madness, untap Anje Falkenrath.

trans-unit.source: "We all hide a little madness behind our sophistication, do we not?"
trans-unit.target: "We all hide a little madness behind our sophistication, do we not?"

trans-unit.resname: OC19·42 | Ghired, Conclave Exile | Card Name
OC19·42 | Ghired, Conclave Exile | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Ghired, Conclave Exile enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample. Whenever Ghired attacks, populate. The token enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: When Ghired, Conclave Exile enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample. Whenever Ghired attacks, populate. The token enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

trans-unit.resname: OC19·45 | Kadena, Slinking Sorcerer | Card Name
OC19·45 | Kadena, Slinking Sorcerer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The first face-down creature spell you cast each turn costs {3} less to cast. Whenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: The first face-down creature spell you cast each turn costs {3} less to cast. Whenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: OC19·45 | Kadena, Slinking Sorcerer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The only constant in life is the unknown."
trans-unit.target: "The only constant in life is the unknown."

trans-unit.resname: OC19·49 | Sevinne, the Chronoclasm | Card Name
OC19·49 | Sevinne, the Chronoclasm | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Sevinne, the Chronoclasm. Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Sevinne, the Chronoclasm. Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.resname: OC19·49 | Sevinne, the Chronoclasm | Flavor Text
